short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes opponenent's username and rating from Chess.com games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lichess has zen mode to let you focus on the game, and not the rating. Chess.com does not, so this extension adds that ability. Press N to toggle, or click on the extension icon in the extension tab in Chrome, and toggle with the button there instead.
